subject: RE: [junit] Re: Any plans to revamp junit?
msgSnippet: ... I agree, but to be nitpicking it wasn t stated that way by the OP. He wrote he *heard* that this was the case. Perhaps you just should have answered: What
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> The statement "all serious people have their own test
> runner" is just downright absurd.

I agree, but to be nitpicking it wasn't stated that way by the OP. He
wrote he *heard* that this was the case. Perhaps you just should have
answered: "What you've heard is wrong." ;)

Kind Regards, Ilja
